name: Poco's Haunted House Party
description:
Poco's about to through her annual ghostie bash, but the house just doesn't have that scary fear vibe. Help light the pumpkins and find decorations to make it suitable for super spooky ghosts!

Move using the arrow keys, and interact with the space bar.

A last minute entry for the Halloween Jam, made during one day :D

  • Main music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
  • Party music from Play on Loop
